title: Lemon Cheesecake
summary: Light, tangy cheesecake with a fresh lemon zest finish
instructions: Preheat oven to 180°C (350°F).
Crush biscuits and mix with melted butter, press into a springform pan.
Beat cream cheese and sugar until smooth.
Add eggs, cream, lemon zest, and juice. Mix well.
Pour mixture over biscuit base.
Bake for 45-50 minutes until set. Cool before serving.

title: Caramel Cheesecake
summary: Rich cheesecake swirled with caramel and a buttery biscuit crust
image: /imgs/Classic New York Cheesecake_ The Elegant Star of Easy and Quick Desserts.jfif
instructions: Preheat oven to 180°C (350°F).
Crush biscuits and mix with butter, press into pan.
Beat cream cheese and sugar until smooth.
Add eggs and cream, mix well.
Pour over base, swirl in caramel sauce.
Bake 45-50 minutes. Cool before serving.

title: Crème Brûlée Cheesecake
summary: Silky cheesecake with a caramelized sugar crust on top.
image: /imgs/Dreamy Creme Brulee Cheesecake Recipe_ Sweet Bliss in Every Bite.jfif
instructions: Preheat oven to 180°C (350°F).
Crush biscuits, mix with butter, press into pan.
Beat cream cheese and sugar until smooth.
Add eggs and cream, mix well.
Pour over base and bake 45-50 minutes.
Sprinkle sugar on top and caramelize with a torch.

title: Strawberry Cheesecake

image: /imgs/Classic New York Cheesecake_ The Elegant Star of Easy and Quick Desserts.jfif
instructions: Preheat oven to 180°C (350°F).
Crush biscuits, mix with butter, press into pan.
